system.effect: When Shuckle is holding a berry, after 24 hours of that Berry going unused, it will be turned into Berry Juice and stored in the Shuckle’s shell. Shuckle may use Berry Juice as a Snack Item; if the juice is bottled, other Pokémon and Trainers may drink the Berry Juice as a Refreshment. If a Berry Juice item is left in the Shuckle’s shell unused for two weeks it solidifies and turns into a Rare Candy.
